name: Eiscue
description: The Penguin Pokémon. It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.

abilities.name: Ice Face
abilities.description: This Pokémon has two forms: Ice Form and No-Ice Form. When in Ice Form, the first time this pokémon takes damage, it takes half that damage but transforms into No-Ice Form. When in No-Ice Form, this pokemon's AC is decreased by 3 and each of its movement speeds are increased by 5 ft. This Pokémon reverts back to Ice Form after a short rest, or on the start of its turn when in the hail.
